00010 // XOF header constants
00011 #define XOFFILE_FORMAT_MAGIC                    ((long)'x' + ((long)'o' << 8) + ((long)'f' << 16) + ((long)' ' << 24))
00012 #define XOFFILE_FORMAT_VERSION                  ((long)'0' + ((long)'3' << 8) + ((long)'0' << 16) + ((long)'3' << 24))
00013 #define XOFFILE_FORMAT_BINARY                   ((long)'b' + ((long)'i' << 8) + ((long)'n' << 16) + ((long)' ' << 24))
00014 #define XOFFILE_FORMAT_TEXT                             ((long)'t' + ((long)'x' << 8) + ((long)'t' << 16) + ((long)' ' << 24))
00015 #define XOFFILE_FORMAT_COMPRESSED               ((long)'c' + ((long)'m' << 8) + ((long)'p' << 16) + ((long)' ' << 24))
00016 #define XOFFILE_FORMAT_FLOAT_BITS_32    ((long)'0' + ((long)'0' << 8) + ((long)'3' << 16) + ((long)'2' << 24))
00017 #define XOFFILE_FORMAT_FLOAT_BITS_64    ((long)'0' + ((long)'0' << 8) + ((long)'6' << 16) + ((long)'4' << 24))

00019 // XOF type constants
00020 #define D3DXF_FILEFORMAT_BINARY                 0x0
00021 #define D3DXF_FILEFORMAT_TEXT                   0x1
00022 #define D3DXF_FILEFORMAT_COMPRESSED             0x2
00023 
00024 // XOF record-bearing tokens
00025 #define TOKEN_NAME                                              0x1
00026 #define TOKEN_STRING                                    0x2
00027 #define TOKEN_INTEGER                                   0x3
00028 #define TOKEN_GUID                                              0x5
00029 #define TOKEN_INTEGER_LIST                              0x6
00030 #define TOKEN_FLOAT_LIST                                0x7

00033 #define TOKEN_CBRACE                                    0xB
00034 #define TOKEN_OPAREN                                    0xC
00035 #define TOKEN_CPAREN                                    0xD
00036 #define TOKEN_OBRACKET                                  0xE
00037 #define TOKEN_CBRACKET                                  0xF
00038 #define TOKEN_OANGLE                                    0x10
00039 #define TOKEN_CANGLE                                    0x11
00040 #define TOKEN_DOT                                               0x12
00041 #define TOKEN_COMMA                                             0x13
00042 #define TOKEN_SEMICOLON                                 0x14
00043 #define TOKEN_TEMPLATE                                  0x1F
00044 #define TOKEN_WORD                                              0x28
00045 #define TOKEN_DWORD                                             0x29
00046 #define TOKEN_FLOAT                                             0x2A
00047 #define TOKEN_DOUBLE                                    0x2B
00048 #define TOKEN_CHAR                                              0x2C
00049 #define TOKEN_UCHAR                                             0x2D
00050 #define TOKEN_SWORD                                             0x2E
00051 #define TOKEN_SDWORD                                    0x2F
00052 #define TOKEN_VOID                                              0x30
00053 #define TOKEN_LPSTR                                             0x31
00054 #define TOKEN_UNICODE                                   0x32
00055 #define TOKEN_CSTRING                                   0x33
00056 #define TOKEN_ARRAY                                             0x34
00057 // Invalid tokens (not part of XOF standard)

00061 #define TOKEN_PLAINUUID                                 0x103
